I had a good response to Shen Nu/The Goddess, so I'll try putting up another melodrama by the same actress. This is ABSOLUTELY SILENT, no audio is included (except at the beginning). Some of you technical boffins can do a better jo of attaching music to the file than I could, or you can just play something simultaneously.


Ruan Lingyu had brief but eventful career. Her films usually deal with the cruel treatment of women in Chinese society; she fell victim to this, and killed herself at a young age. This film is based on a traditional story about unrequited love.

The badly framed picture is only an irritation when intertitles appear on screen; otherwise, it's no worse than pan-and-scan movies.

Anotherreseed in flv format. Stupid TPB makes me label this video-other because of the small file size.

I seeded this b4, bt the torrent died. Please reseed generously.
